The royal council is a busy and prestigious place. Spending several years in the company of my [From.GetTitle] and the other councillors has increased my prestige and standing among the nobility.

It has now been [global_lmmcxp_years_for_councillor_trait_2.GetValue] years since I first became a royal councillor. Throughout these years I have learned much about dealing with other lords and ladies as well as gained a level of prestige in the eyes of my peers.

I can hardly remember my first day in the royal council chamber. It seems like a lifetime ago. I have come far since then and have learned many things about men and the meanings hidden behind their charming words. Wherever I go, people welcome me vigorously and treat me with respect worthy of a [From.GetTitle]'s councillor.
The imperial council has been an experience so deep and vast that I could write an entire book about it if I had the time! I have learned many things and have gained a status of respect among people.

It has been a long time that I have served on the [From.GetTitle]'s council but every moment has been exhilirating and full of life. I have gained deep insights into the inner workings of such a prestigious court and people everywhere look up to me and my accomplishments.

The council of the [From.GetTitle] is practically my second home now. I have served the crown all these years and have been part of some of the most important decisions for the realm. People treat me like a close companion of the [From.GetTitle] [From.GetHerselfHimself]. It is an honor and privilege most can only dream of!
I deserve it.
